short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter Automation, auto follow, auto unfollow, auto like tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# FEATURES

✓ Auto Follow for TW.
✓ Auto Unfollow and Auto Like a tweet.
✓ by user's followers / following.
✓ by tweet retweet, quotes, replies/comments and likers.
✓ by specific user list and import from CSV file.

# FOLLOW SETTINGS
- Skip protected Profiles
- Skip accounts without image
- Skip profiles without bio
- Skip accounts you ever followed, only applies to profiles followed with this extension
- Skip profiles that already follow you
- Black list, Profiles you will never follow

# UNFOLLOW SETTINGS
- Skip profiles that follow you
- Skip verified accounts
- Only unfollow profiles previously followed with this extension
- White list, Accounts you will never unfollow

Kindly do not use for SPAMMING which is Twitter strictly prohibited.

# FAQ

https://twmassfollow.extensionsfox.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.

# DATA PRIVACY

All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.
